item.title: Thunder Penguin – Part 2
item.description: Thunder Penguin – Part 2 by yuling & Teacher Jesse Audio by Jesse “Okay, Thunder, we’ve given you everything we’ve got,” said one of the puffer fish.

item.title: Thunder the Penguin – Part 1
item.description: Thunder the Penguin – Part 1 by yuling & Teacher Jesse Audio by Jesse A quick little penguin speeds through the water.

item.title: The Pancake Star
item.description: The Pancake Star by yuling & Teacher Jesse Audio by Jesse Inside of a famous Japanese restaurant in the heart of Tokyo city is a delicious smell of honey.

item.title: A Change of Heart
item.description: A Change of Heart by yuling & Teacher Jesse Audio by Jesse A colourful and shiny metal cube sits silently on top of a desk at an accounting firm.

item.title: The Ice Slide
item.description: The Ice Slide by yuling & Teacher Jesse Audio by Jesse Harsh blizzard winds are forcing their way across a freezing desert.

item.title: The Bouncing Bird Delivers Thunder to His Mom
item.description: The Bouncing Bird Delivers Thunder to His Mom by yuling & Teacher Jesse Audio by Jesse It was a stormy and dark night when baby Brent was playing with some toy birds.

item.title: The Giant Red Panda
item.description: The Giant Red Panda by yuling & Teacher Jesse Audio by Jesse It is 9pm on a Monday on a very hot August night.
